entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who tried to contact someone (Him) and is now walking back up to the castle with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one performing the Obliteration Charm and planning lessons for Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone that Trelawney is trying to throw out but Hermione is determined not to let happen.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is mentioned as the one who is trying to throw Hagrid out.

entities.name: him
entities.description: Him is a pronoun referring to someone but not explicitly stated.

entities.name: obliviation charm
entities.description: The Obliteration Charm is mentioned as the spell Hermione is performing.

relationships.description: Hermione is supporting Hagrid by planning his lessons and trying to prevent Trelawney from throwing him out.
Trelawney is threatening to throw Hagrid out.
